content.raw:
Most of the recently merged changes are running in our lab for quite a while now. I'd say they are well tested.

Not sure what you put in your release notesbut here is a list of all the changes that happen since the last version bumps:

Runviewer:

* faster Filedialog open
* PEP8
* UI (Icons, Buttons, File menu)
* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* Shutter Markers
* channel configs
* Bugfixes

Runmanager:

* Generalised globals diff
* copy global groups
* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* Removed mise
* bugfixes

labscript_utils:

* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* test suite prework
* module watcher update
* better Dragdroptabs
* Bugfixes

labscript_devices:

* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* acquisition after wait
* DummyPseudoclock
* Pulseblaster Maxinstructions
* UI changes to camera and pulseblasters
* pulseblaster wait workaround
* bugfixes

labscript:

* bugfixes
* mercurial in h5 file
* Ramp collision checks
* ramp optimization
* Markers
* shutter openstate in h5 file
* default values in constructor for outputs
* faster pulse_sequence
* bugfixes	

BLACS:

* better shot turnaround time
* Repeat last
* UI improvements
* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* Clear button
* Analysis-filter callbacks
* Bugfixes
* analysis submission improvements

lyse:

* routine_storage
* copy to clipboard
* better handeling of deleted shots
* bugfixes
* Faster file loading
* Update dataframe no read
* PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
* Store UI and routines on close
* prevent crash of analysis loop

Most of the recently merged changes are running in our lab for quite a while now. I'd say they are well tested.

Not sure what you put in your release notesbut here is a list of all the changes that happen since the last version bumps:

Runviewer:

  • faster Filedialog open
  • PEP8
  • UI (Icons, Buttons, File menu)
  • PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
  • Shutter Markers
  • channel configs
  • Bugfixes

Runmanager:

  • Generalised globals diff
  • copy global groups
  • PyQt5/qtutils2 compat
  • Removed mise
  • bugfixes

labscript_utils:

  • test suite prework
  • module watcher update

  • UI changes to camera and pulseblasters

  • ramp optimization
